Name: Loong Bun
AttributesDescription: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: This round bun featuring Loong horns comes in a variety of flavors. Highly cherished by the people of Huanglong, they are a staple on festive tables. Legend has it that consuming a whole bun brings good fortune in the following year.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases DEF of all Resonators in the team by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
